```{r}
# load necessary library
library(forecast) # for prediction

# load all csv file into dataframe
temp = list.files(pattern="*.csv")
for (i in 1:length(temp)) {
  assign(strtrim(temp[i], (nchar(temp[i]) - 4)), read.csv(temp[i]))
}


```
